implementations.name: main
implementations.comment: Takes one number and adds it to itself, this group has no connectors!

generics.name: Add
generics.comment: There should be a method that defines connections without syntactical 'sugar' :)

connections.comment: define connections here.. much cleaner than in the generics

meta.description: Main Logic of 'Add'. Main itself is considered a bad name for groups as they don't communicate the real semantics other than beeing a starting point
